turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, we're having a party and I would like to order some pizzas for pick-up from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh awesome. let's get those pizzas started. what did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We're going to get three medium pizzas, one with tomato and onion, the other with onions and a third with mushroom hot peppers, extra cheese on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for the first pizza with tomatoes, did you want regular or sun dried?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the order is for 3 medium pizzas, 1 with regular tomato and onion, 1 with onions and 1 with mushrooms and hot peppers, all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $35.55 is the total, did you want the order to br placed now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. And how long till I can go pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy the party and the pizza. good bye!
